metadata.Title: CVE-2020-11729 on Ubuntu 20.04 LTS (focal) - medium.
metadata.Description:
An issue was discovered in DAViCal Andrew's Web Libraries (AWL) through 0.60. Long-term session cookies, uses to provide long-term session continuity, are not generated securely, enabling a brute-force attack that may be successful.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2020-11729` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

libawl-php - 0.60-1+deb10u1ubuntu1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: awl package in focal was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '0.60-1+deb10u1ubuntu1').
